diagrams.description: A flowchart showing the fundamental concepts and structure of Health Economics.
diagrams.mermaid_code:
flowchart TD
    HealthEconomics[Health Economics] --> Field1[Economics]
    HealthEconomics --> Field2[Medicine]
    HealthEconomics --> Integration[Integration Areas]
    economics --> economicsSub1[Theory]
    economics --> economicsSub2[Practice]
    medicine --> medicineSub1[Theory]
    medicine --> medicineSub2[Practice]
    Integration --> Methods[Research Methods]
    Integration --> Applications[Applications]
